page.title: 07EDUCATION
page.content: THERE ARE FIVE HUNDRED STUDENTS THAT STAY IN HERNE BAY FOR 25 DAYS IN JULY. ALL THE STUDENTS COME FROM FRANCE, 99% ARE FRENCH AND THE REST ARE ALGERIAN. THEY LEARN ENGLISH, TEXT AND COMMENTARY AT THE COLLEGE. THE STUDENTS AGE RANGE IS BETWEEN 1O-18 YEARS OLD. 13 PUPILS LEARN IN EACH CLASSROOM. THE ACTIVITIES THAT THE STUDENTS TAKE PART IN ARE TENNIS, FOOTBALL, SWIMMING, CRICKET AND HOCKEY. THE STUDENTS STAY WITH FAMILIES. THE STUDENTS LIKE HERNE BAY BECAUSE IT IS NICE, CLEAN AND FLOWERY AND LIKE GOING SHOPPING IN HERNE BAY. MY FRENCH STUDENT LIKES SPORTS, HE NORMALLY PLAYS FOOTBALL AND TENNIS. HE LIKES GOING SHOPPING IN THE MARKET. HIS FAVOURITE ACTOR IS CALLED PLATTINI HE LIKES GOING TO THE VIDEO SHOP WITH MY MUM BECAUSE HE LIKES TO GET HORROR FILMS TO WATCH.
